Title: The Gravel-Eater
Description:
This mod features a new slugcat campaign, region properties, and mechanics

Some features that Gravel Eater has are:

- Ability to eat anything that they can shove in their mouth
- Can craft fire spears and other items similar to Artificer
- If you have nothing stored in your stomach you can regurgitate rocks and eventually make yourself malnourished
- Can and will sink in deep water if full enough
- Food drains over time
- Hated by Garbage Worms

Gravel Eater's main mechanic activates when they are malnourished or not

if nourished:

- Resistant to projectiles and stunning
- Body slam
- Immune to Wormgrass
- Unable to roll

if malnourished:

- Increased damage and velocity to thrown weapons
- Boosts to move set
- Mauling
- Faster Drain speed

There are many other things that you will discover for yourself as well :)

This update is beatable, there is a side quest for a future alternate ending but all this is past a locked gate with no content behind it.

for best experience, have Merge Fix between Gravel Eater and More Slugcats for proper creature spawns and restart your game if your save is before the Ascension Update or many new things wont work.
Do NOT use jolly co-op in Gravel Eater's Campaign! It is very broken, play at your own discretion!

Enjoy!
